entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:21 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 6:21 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
